definition: lower course of a river/low-class/mean and lowly/vulgar/obscene
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: Those college girls went slumming and came home with sex diseases.
sentences.chinese: 那些大学女生跟下流的人“胡”混，带回了性病。

sentences.english: He felt a warm trickle of sweat running down the crack to his anus.
sentences.chinese: 他觉得一股热热的汗水沿着股沟向下流。

sentences.english: Rivers of waters run down mine eyes, because they keep not thy law.
sentences.chinese: 我的眼泪下流成河，因为他们不守你的律法。

sentences.english: High society, always like to do some dirty thing.
sentences.chinese: 上流社会的人，总喜欢做点下流的事。

sentences.english: The water falls from the tap drop by drop.
sentences.chinese: 水从水龙头里一滴一滴地往下流。

sentences.english: The rainwater is splashing down from the hole of the roof.
sentences.chinese: 雨水从屋顶的破洞处哗哗往下流。

sentences.english: The use of four-letter words here will not be tolerdinedd.
sentences.chinese: 在这儿使用四个字母的鄙俚下流的词是不能容忍的。

sentences.english: It may be dirty dancing, but creator, Jeff Costa insists that Cardio-Striptease is good for your health.
sentences.chinese: 这种舞蹈也许下流，但创始人简称它很健康。

sentences.english: The water poured off the roof.
Janet went red in the face when you told that dirty joke.
sentences.chinese: 当你开那个下流玩笑时，珍妮特羞红了脸。

sentences.english: And the mother looked down in her lap, and the tears ran down over her cheeks;
sentences.chinese: 母亲低下头来望着地面，眼泪沿着双颊向下流。

sentences.english: she helmed a film called ‘Filth and Wisdom’ in 2008.
sentences.chinese: 08年她执导了一部名为《下流与智慧》的电影。

sentences.english: Mine eye runneth down with rivers of water for the destruction of the daughter of my people.
sentences.chinese: 因我众民遭的毁灭，我就眼泪下流如河。

sentences.english: Ane they tumble from this higher land to meet the Ganges on the plains.
sentences.chinese: 支流从高地往下流，与平原上的恒河汇合。

sentences.english: 16 he brought streams out of a rocky crag and made water flow down like rivers.
sentences.chinese: 他使水从磐石涌出，叫水如江河下流。

definition: to have no sense of shame/brazen
morally loose, lewd and low, lascivious and mean/wanton
variant of 下三濫|下三滥[xia4 san1 lan4]
sordid and contemptible (idiom); vile and repulsive (esp. character or action)
